item.title: First Week
item.description: Subject Introduction to the course and characteristics of the atmosphere Reading Chapter 0 and 1 in the textbook Lecture Slides fluid_on_earth.pdf (1900 ko) Link to the videos See in the webpage, “Weather in a Tank” Movies Earth Observatory - Water Vapor Animation.mp4 (1540 ko)

item.title: The second week
item.description: Subject The radiative energy budget on earth. Reading Chapter 2 in the textbook Lecture Slides energybudget.pdf (1500 ko) energybudget_2.pdf (800 ko) The link to the python file (Google Colaboratory) This link give you the page that is not editable. (READ only) To actually run the code, you need to copy to your Google drive.
